items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: A little big in the shoulders but otherwise fits well Read more
items.author: tracie keys

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.author: Cotasha Tillery

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love/hate exemplified
items.body: Ok so there's one thing only I will take off for and it's my fault honestly but it should burn in eternal hellfire or something. Glitter. They use glitter. And it. Get. Everywhere. It's insane how much I'm understating just how everywhere it gets lol. The problem is, the length, style, fit, sturdiness and washability are all out of this world amazing and that just irks me bc I haven't worn it since the faithful night of the glitter incident. But the style and value is there in spades. If you don't mind glitter, well first what is wrong with you and who hurt you??! But second, this would be without a doubt a highly recommended item from me at least for whatever that (isn't) worth, if not for the blasted glitter. It really is gorgeous though. Mmm. And so darn comfy! Makes me want to pull it out of: the drawer. Ladies you know what I'm getting at, the drawer where clothes you love but hate go to stasis. Read more
items.author: Kevin Ray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Itâ€™s absolutely beatyful
items.body: Fits beautifully! We love this dress Read more
items.author: Melissa roney

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars So nice
items.body: This dress is so pretty in person. Itâ€™s a really good quality dress and fits really good. It isnâ€™t super short and fits TTS. I love the mini bell sleeve look; sleeves are the perfect length. Due to the neckline though, Iâ€™ll have to wear a sticky bra because Iâ€™m in the Itty bitty committee ðŸ˜… but the color is really nice and I canâ€™t wait to wear it. Very comfy and a little stretchy. **UPDATE ** THIS DRESS WILL GET GLITTER EVERYWHERE ! I wore it for my birthday brunch on 8/23, today is 10/10, and the glitter is still stuck in my car seat. Tried to get it vacuumed out, no luck Read more
items.author: Tee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Less sparkly
items.body: Less sparkly than shown. Tight fit, but not uncomfortable. Color is very pretty. Read more
items.author: Troy B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars really good dress
items.body: AMAZING DRESSS THE WAY IT LOOKED ON MY BESTIE WAS STUNNING. The fabric material feels very high quality and had a good thickness, Bestie said it was comfortable. It fit her perfectly and the LOOK omg the sparkle is soo nice like stars on a beautiful night sky. Read more
items.author: MilkMochi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Look Snatched Yet Feel Comfortable
items.body: It was hard to choose a color as this dress looked great in all the options. I ultimately went with the navy. Hereâ€™s what I like: - This dress is as expected from the listing and photos. - It is quality made and fits true to size. - Itâ€™s actually pretty comfortable while still being flattering. Hereâ€™s what Iâ€™m neutral about: - The shoulders of the sleeves donâ€™t really like to stay up on me. I may have to take them in a little. But I have a short torso. Here's what I don't like: - The neckline on my dress is a messy, with a lot of the sheer material sticking up and out haphazardly. But Iâ€™m hoping steaming will help soften that. Overall I really like this dress. It looks great, and is surprisingly comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: sweettems

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Navy, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
